title: Eve
content:
It is the moment and period when
the curtain falls
the flag rises
The very one
goes pass your vision while
remains in the mind

Layer by layer, point by point
separate apart then come together again
seeking for the beginning named end
the darkest day and
the night when sun shines most

Lines come from both then end the same
The silvery melt core is singing like a child
It sings just for the two
The two only exist in its song
